name: cagents
description: Universal multi-domain agent system with 228 specialized agents for Claude Code. V2 Universal Workflow Architecture with 5 universal workflow agents working across all 11 domains via YAML configuration. 8 core infrastructure + 220 domain experts. Supports recursive workflows, configuration-driven behavior, and multi-domain coordination. Domains: software (41), business (18), creative (17), planning (16), sales (17), marketing (21), finance (16), operations (15), hr (19), legal (14), support (15).
